metadata.name: Sysinternals PsSuspend Execution
metadata.comment: Detects usage of Sysinternals PsSuspend which can be abused to suspend critical processes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('pssuspend.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pssuspend.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pssuspend64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of Sysinternals PsSuspend which can be abused to suspend critical processes
